messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2337
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/6/2002 9:21:26 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... John Rosemond - he thinks kids need lots of Vitamin N . --pam National Home Education
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/6/2002 9:21:26 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> << One guy (Someone might remember who, some columnist
> or parenting-advice guy?) says if you don't say "no" at least five times a
> day, and if you don't say "no" more often than you say "yes," you're being
> a
> bad parent. (Anyone know what I'm failing to remember? Maybe I don't have
>
> it quite right.) >>
>
> Yeah! That came up on your list Sandra. Jerry something...he is a columnist
>
> and I think wrote a book?
> NO, it wasn't at your list, it was at unschooling.com message boards, I'm
> pretty sure.

John Rosemond - he thinks kids need lots of "Vitamin N".

--pam

National Home Education Network
http://www.NHEN.org
Changing the Way the World Sees Homeschooling!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
